CustomField.inlineHelpText: If known, what was the underlying reason(s) that led to the person dying of a natural death, before receiving MAID? (choose all that apply):
CustomField.label: Underlying reason(s) of death

value.fullName: Referred or requested MAID too late
value.label: Referred or requested MAID too late

value.fullName: Died before both assessments were completed
value.label: Died before both assessments were completed

value.fullName: Found eligible but died before scheduled MAID provision
value.label: Found eligible but died before scheduled MAID provision

value.fullName: Never chose a date for MAID provision
value.label: Never chose a date for MAID provision

value.fullName: Loss of capacity to consent without a waiver of final consent being completed
value.label: Loss of capacity to consent without a waiver of final consent being completed

value.fullName: Lack of pharmacy willing to provide MAID medications
value.label: Lack of pharmacy willing to provide MAID medications
